channel.title: Preact on Yadullah Duman
channel.description: Recent content in Preact on Yadullah Duman

item.title: Preact: Alternative to React
item.description:
The original post is written in German on the MaibornWolff website.

The following is a plain translation of it.

In this blog post, I want to introduce you to Preact. About a year ago, I had the opportunity to test it during a spike. As a React fan, it was exciting to try out a good alternative, and I was impressed by its performance. Recently, the new version 10, “Preact X,” was released, bringing additional new features.
